directions: In large skillet melt butter over medium-high heat.  Cook ground beef in butter until brown, 3 to 5 minutes.  Stir in chopped onion and cook until beef juices run clear, 3 to 5 minutes.  Drain.
Stir in salt, pepper, paprika and chile powder.  Add water to cover, and simmer until water is absorbed, stirring frequently, 10 to 15 minutes.
title: Joanie's Coney Island Hot Dog Sauce
